title: Blended Learning-Based Expert Training Program for Strengthening Science-Integrated Subject Teaching Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Customized training programs for healthcare/legal/technical professionals conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners will cultivate the ability to systematically explain core concepts of integrated science subjects (physics, chemistry, biology, earth science) according to the 5E Learning Model.
Design and implement PBL (Project-Based Learning) tasks tailored to learners' proficiency levels in a blended learning environment, ensuring over 80% participation.
Analyze formative assessment data to diagnose learners' conceptual understanding at three levels (basic-applied-creative) and provide feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
